Classes/ConsentWebView.html#/s:19SourceP.name: IAB_CONSENT_CMP_PRESENT
Classes/ConsentWebView.html#/s:19SourceP.abstract: If the user has consent data stored, reading for this key in the UserDefaults will return 1

Classes/ConsentWebView.html#/s:19SourceP.name: IAB_CONSENT_SUBJECT_TO_GDPR
Classes/ConsentWebView.html#/s:19SourceP.abstract: If the user is subject to GDPR, reading for this key in the UserDefaults will return 1 otherwise 0

Classes/ConsentWebView.html#/s:19SourceP.name: IAB_CONSENT_CONSENT_STRING
Classes/ConsentWebView.html#/s:19SourceP.abstract: They key used to store the IAB Consent string for the user in the UserDefaults

Classes/ConsentWebView.html#/s:19SourceP.name: IAB_CONSENT_PARSED_PURPOSE_CONSENTS
Classes/ConsentWebView.html#/s:19SourceP.abstract: They key used to read and write the parsed IAB Purposes consented by the user in the UserDefaults

Classes/ConsentWebView.html#/s:19SourceP.name: IAB_CONSENT_PARSED_VENDOR_CONSENTS
Classes/ConsentWebView.html#/s:19SourceP.abstract: The key used to read and write the parsed IAB Vendor consented by the user in the UserDefaults

Classes/ConsentWebView.html#/s:19SourceP.name: accountId
Classes/ConsentWebView.html#/s:19SourceP.abstract: The id of your account can be found in the Publisher’s portal -> Account menu

Classes/ConsentWebView.html#/s:19SourceP.name: siteName
Classes/ConsentWebView.html#/s:19SourceP.abstract: The site name which the campaign and scenarios will be loaded from

Classes/ConsentWebView.html#/s:19SourceP.name: page
Classes/ConsentWebView.html#/s:19SourceP.abstract: Page is merely for logging purposes, eg. https://mysitename.example/page

Classes/ConsentWebView.html#/s:19SourceP.name: isStage
Classes/ConsentWebView.html#/s:19SourceP.abstract: Indicates if the campaign is a stage campaign

Classes/ConsentWebView.html#/s:19SourceP.name: isInternalStage
Classes/ConsentWebView.html#/s:19SourceP.abstract: indicates if the data should come from SourcePoint’s staging environment. Most of the times that’s not what you want.

Classes/ConsentWebView.html#/s:19SourceP.name: onMessageChoiceSelect
Classes/ConsentWebView.html#/s:19SourceP.abstract: A Callback that will be called when the user selects an option on the WebView.

Classes/ConsentWebView.html#/s:19SourceP.name: onInteractionComplete
Classes/ConsentWebView.html#/s:19SourceP.abstract: A Callback to be called when the user finishes interacting with the WebView

Classes/ConsentWebView.html#/s:19SourceP.name: choiceType
Classes/ConsentWebView.html#/s:19SourceP.abstract: Holds the choice type the user has chosen after interacting with the ConsentWebView

Classes/ConsentWebView.html#/s:19SourceP.name: euconsent
Classes/ConsentWebView.html#/s:19SourceP.abstract: The IAB consent string, set after the user has chosen after interacting with the ConsentWebView

Classes/ConsentWebView.html#/s:19SourceP.name: consentUUID
Classes/ConsentWebView.html#/s:19SourceP.abstract: The UUID assigned to the user, set after the user has chosen after interacting with the ConsentWebView

Classes/ConsentWebView.html#/s:19SourceP.name: customConsent
Classes/ConsentWebView.html#/s:19SourceP.abstract: Holds a collection of strings representing the non-IAB consents

Classes/ConsentWebView.html#/s:19SourceP.name: init(accountId:siteName:)
Classes/ConsentWebView.html#/s:19SourceP.abstract: Initialises the library with accountId and siteName.

Classes/ConsentWebView.html#/s:19SourceP.name: getIABVendorConsents(_:)
Classes/ConsentWebView.html#/s:19SourceP.abstract: Get the IAB consents given to each vendor id in the array passed as parameter

Classes/ConsentWebView.html#/s:19SourceP.name: getIABPurposeConsents(_:)
Classes/ConsentWebView.html#/s:19SourceP.abstract: Checks if the IAB purposes passed as parameter were given consent or not.

Classes/ConsentWebView.html#/s:19SourceP.name: getGdprApplies()
Classes/ConsentWebView.html#/s:19SourceP.abstract: Checks if GDPR applies the user

Classes/ConsentWebView.html#/s:19SourceP.name: getCustomVendorConsent(forId:)
Classes/ConsentWebView.html#/s:19SourceP.abstract: Get the non-IAB consents given to a single vendor id

Classes/ConsentWebView.html#/s:19SourceP.name: getCustomVendorConsents(forIds:)
Classes/ConsentWebView.html#/s:19SourceP.abstract: Checks if the non-IAB purposes passed as parameter were given consent or not.

Classes/ConsentWebView.html#/s:19SourceP.name: getPurposeConsent(forId:)
Classes/ConsentWebView.html#/s:19SourceP.abstract: Checks if a non-IAB purpose was given consent.

Classes/ConsentWebView.html#/s:19SourceP.name: getPurposeConsents(forIds:)
Classes/ConsentWebView.html#/s:19SourceP.abstract: Checks if a non-IAB purpose was given consent.

Classes/ConsentWebView.html.name: ConsentWebView
Classes/ConsentWebView.html.abstract: SourcePoint’s Consent SDK is a WebView that loads SourcePoint’s web consent managment tool
